resources.string:
ABOUT
 
 Freefall Highscore encourages you to drop you device from high places to achieve the longest duration of free fall. We'll record the video and let you submit it to the website featuring the leading drops.
 
 http://freefallhighscore.com 
 
 James George - concept and direction, iOS development
 Logan Best - web development
 Michael Zick Doherty - Android development
 Robert Gay - Android development
 Helen Mair - graphic design
 Maria Mendez - iOS development
 Caitlin Morris - exhibition design
 Juan Muller - iOS and web development
 
 Developed with support from The Creators Project and Eyebeam Art+Technology Center
 
 Built using open source code by
 Stig Brautaset and Hunter and Johnson.
 
 DISCLAIMER
 
 In no event shall the developers of this application be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, personal injury, injury to a third party, damage to property, lost profits, business interruption, or lost information) rising out of 'Authorized Users' use of or inability to use the FreefallHS MOBILE APP, even if we has been advised of the possibility of such damages.  We reserve the right to remove any submitted content that we deem to be inappropriate or inauthentic use of the application.

In no event shall the developers of this application be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, personal injury, injury to a third party, damage to property, lost profits, business interruption, or lost information) rising out of \'Authorized Users\' use of or inability to use the FreefallHS MOBILE APP, even if we has been advised of the possibility of such damages. The application developers shall have no liability with respect to the content submitted by the FreefallHS MOBILE APP or any part thereof, including but not limited to errors or omissions contained therein, libel, infringements of rights of publicity, privacy, trademark rights, business interruption, personal injury, damage to property, loss of privacy, moral rights or the disclosure of confidential information.\n \n We reserve the right to remove any submitted content that we deem to be inappropriate or inauthentic use of the application.

1. Press to start recording
 2. You have 20 seconds to release the phone to the effect of gravity
 3. The camera records the whole thing go down
 4. Log into your Google account to submit your drop videos
 5. Your videos will be ranked on our high score leader board
You have 20 seconds to release the phone to the effect of gravity
The camera records the whole thing go down
Log into your Google account to submit your drop videos
Your videos will be ranked on our high score leader board
